Bund

𓃀 𓂝 𓈖 𓏏 𓅿 = 𓋭 𓅿 պարանոց paranocʿ "neck" 𓅿

𒋳 TAG TUKU 𓋭 𒋳 TAG 𒋴 touch, tag, tie 𒋳 TUKU 𒋴 tackle 𓊃 𓎡 𓍢 𓂡 ƫakle 𓍿 𓊃 𓋭 | 𓋭 𓊃 𓏲 𓂡 𒋳 TUKU 𒋴 take 𓂩 hold, attack 𓏏 𓉔 𓂾

𓍿 𓊃 𓋭 𓍿 𓊃 𓊃 𓋭 … 𓍿 𓋭 𓊃 th's, th'ss, … for to knot, to tie, to tie together, etc.

𓋭 𓅿 | neck | ϧⲁϧ ج ي د ʒ-y-d ≈ 𓊃 𓏏 𓋭 𓊃 𓏲 𓂡 | tie (knot) | 𓋭 𓏏 | knot | con.t 󴞥

𓎬 #tjt tyet Isis-knot, knot of Isis or girdle of Isis 𓊨 𓏏 𓆇 𓁐 ꜣst 'Steia 𓇼 <> 𓍯 𓃾 𓆷 Stier (f!) <> astra Astarte

S24 𓋭 bind / fasce
1) 𓋭 fasce,face,Fessel,vice-versa 𓋭𓃀 שפט Schafott 𓇩 𓏜 𓇪 卜 fascie 𓋭 𓊃 δεσμ
2) 𓋭 bund / bond / bind … 𓋭 𓇩 𓏜 𓇪 卜 bǔ
